bestBHT.bht: In this section, Matthat and Salathiel are mentioned, and scholars debate whether they are different individuals despite being referred to as both father and son. Matthan, the grandfather of Joseph, is distinct from Matthat. Some argue for the omission of Matthat and Salathiel, while others connect Matthat to the renowned King Jannai. The identities of these figures remain uncertain, and their names are common in Hebrew. The debate surrounding their identities invites further exploration and discussion.
